name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: A popular houseplant with large, glossy, and uniquely split leaves.
watering: Water once a week, allowing the soil to dry slightly between waterings.

name: Snake Plant
description: An easy-to-care-for plant with tall, stiff, and upright leaves.
watering: Water every 2-3 weeks, letting the soil dry completely.

name: Pothos
description: A fast-growing vine plant with heart-shaped leaves.
watering: Water every 1-2 weeks, allowing the top inch of soil to dry out.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: A trendy plant with large, violin-shaped leaves.
watering: Water once a week, keeping the soil moist but not soggy.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A hardy succulent plant with thick, fleshy leaves that store water.
watering: Water every 3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely.

name: Peace Lily
description: A plant with dark green leaves and white, hood-like flowers.
watering: Water weekly, keeping the soil slightly moist.
